# WEAPON::GET_LOCKON_DISTANCE_OF_CURRENT_PED_WEAPON

## Summary
Gets the lock on distance of the current peds weapon (returns -1.0f if not found or invalid weapon)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **FLOAT**
